name: Poached Halibut with Chunky Pineapple Salsa
author: Swanson®
summary: Poaching halibut is a quick and easy way to ensure good results...and when you serve the halibut with our sweet and savory salsa, the dish goes from really good to absolutely delicious!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice
1 ¾ cups Swanson® Chicken Broth or Swanson® Chicken Stock
directions: Drain the pineapple and reserve 2/3 cup juice
Stir the pineapple chunks, cucumber, red pepper, red onion, vinegar and hot pepper sauce, if desired, in a medium bowl
Heat the broth, wine and reserved pineapple juice in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat to a boil
Add the fish to the skillet
Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until the fish flakes easily when tested with a fork
Serve the fish with the pineapple salsa
